mapper.select: SELECT ca.car_name, ca.car_type, fi.file_name, fi.file_route FROM tb_carinfo AS ca inner JOIN tb_storeinfo AS st on st.store_no = ca.store_no inner JOIN tb_fileinfo AS fi on fi.file_name = ca.car_name WHERE (ca.car_use = "Z")AND(st.store_name = #{store_name}) AND ca.car_no not IN (SELECT ca.car_no FROM tb_carinfo AS ca INNER JOIN tb_reservationinfo AS re ON ca.car_no = re.car_no AND (#{dayChoiceOut} BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(re.reser_outdate, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(re.reser_indate, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i')) OR (#{dayChoiceIn} BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(re.reser_outdate, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(re.reser_indate, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i')) );
SELECT ca.*, fi.file_route FROM tb_carinfo AS ca inner JOIN tb_fileinfo AS fi on fi.file_name = ca.car_name WHERE ca.car_name = #{carChoice}
